title: Does This Sound Bad To You?
description:
Alec Baldwin can't help himself and took question from paparazzi (00:11:01). Longtime Red Sox broadcaster and player Jerry Remy passed away at the age of 68 (00:34:09). Kirk tells the story of when Remy called him to apologize about a radio segment on WEEI. Tim in Canton has Patriots takes with Christian Arcand on 985. The Sports Hub before the game (01:04:35). Justin chimes in on his new podcast and the troubling deer over-population (01:54:10) & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
